videos.title: Sample Video 1
videos.description: This is a sample video to demonstrate the catalog functionality. Replace with your own videos.

videos.title: Sample Video 2
videos.description: Another sample video with a longer description to show how the card layout handles different content lengths. This demonstrates the text truncation feature.

videos.title: Sample Video 3
videos.description: A third sample video to populate the grid and show the responsive layout in action.
